snippet: According to an analysis of briefs filed over a recent three-year period, groups who favor business interests file the most friend-of-the-court briefs encouraging the Supreme Court to review a case.
lead_paragraph: According to an analysis of briefs filed over a recent three-year period, groups who favor business interests file the most friend-of-the-court briefs encouraging the Supreme Court to review a case.

headline.main: The Most Active ‘Friends of the Court’
